thread.title: Yep, the Capitals are a popular Stanley Cup pick
thread.title_full: Yep, the Capitals are a popular Stanley Cup pick

author: Scott Allen
title: Yep, the Capitals are a popular Stanley Cup pick
text:
Yep, the Capitals are a popular Stanley Cup pick Resize Text By Scott Allen October 8 at 3:59 PM Follow @ScottSAllen (AP Photo/Nick Wass) 
While the Capitals intend to “stick to the script” in Barry Trotz’s second year at the helm, Capitals fans are probably best served to follow owner Ted Leonsis’s advice when it comes to the script being written by various pundits for Washington’s season. 
“Face it; embrace it. Re-circulate the pixels, and then hit delete,” Leonsis wrote of columnist Rob McKenzie’s prediction in Abu Dhabi’s English-language newspaper, The National, that the Capitals will win the Stanley Cup . 
Leonsis, who has blogged about other “jinx pixels” of late , called it an over-the-top jinx. There have been plenty of stateside jinxes of the Capitals leading up to the season, which began Wednesday. Here’s a sampling of people predicting Alex Ovechkin and Co. will do big things in 2015-16.
